p: To record the time between the appearance of the first and seventh pair of stem leaves (excluding cotyledons), the plants were checked and measured daily (following Gramig and Stoltenberg 2007). The leaves were assumed to have appeared when their size was equal to or exceeded 1 mm. After appearance of the seventh pair of leaves, height was measured and the plants harvested. The biomass was divided into shoots and roots, dried at 70 Â°C for 8 h and weighed.
